pullRequest.title: [KEYCLOAK-13927] Allow deleting permission tickets with the Authz client
pullRequest.bodyText: This allows deleting permission tickets with the Authz client.

commit.message: [KEYCLOAK-13927] Allow deleting permission tickets with the Authz client

nodes.bodyText: Instead of passing the ticket representation we can just use the ID (String) as the argument for this method.

commit.message: [KEYCLOAK-13927] Fix java doc @param name in PermissionResource
[KEYCLOAK-13927] Accept only ticketId instead of the PermissionTicketRepresentation for delete in PermissionResource
